<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_hete_clv_maximiz_campaigns"> <x_hete_clv_maximiz_campaigns action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaign_name>upsell</campaign_name> <campaign_type>retention</campaign_type> <channel>email</channel> <created_by>System User</created_by> <customer_tier>gold</customer_tier> <enable_ab_testing>false</enable_ab_testing> <estimated_reach>3257</estimated_reach> <launch_date/> <launch_time/> <launched_at>2025-12-03 00:00:00</launched_at> <message_body>Dear {CustomerName},
As a valued Gold tier customer, we are writing to inform you of important updates to your policy. Based on your profile, we recommend considering these coverage options: Auto Insurance.
Please review the attached information and contact us if you have any questions.
Best regards, Customer Service Team</message_body> <priority>medium</priority> <product_propensity>Auto Insurance</product_propensity> <send_test_email>false</send_test_email> <status>launched</status> <subject_line>Important Gold Policy Update - Action Required</subject_line> <sys_created_by>vedavallic@hexaware.com</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2025-12-03 14:30:37</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6eef619aebed7a904870fc4dbad0cd18</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>vedavallic@hexaware.com</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2025-12-03 14:30:37</sys_updated_on> <tone_style>professional</tone_style> </x_hete_clv_maximiz_campaigns> </record_update>
